meta.title: ekkOS_™ - Cognitive Infrastructure for AI
meta.description: ekkOS_™ gives AI agents persistent cognitive infrastructure. Three-plane architecture, Golden Loop learning, and long-horizon reasoning.

hero.headline: Your AI should learn and remember like humans.
hero.subheadline: ekkOS is cognitive infrastructure—not just memory. Three-plane architecture (Data/Processing/Access) with Golden Loop learning that makes AI agents build on past experiences and improve over time. When you come back tomorrow, next week, or three months from now, your AI still knows your stack, style, and solutions.
hero.worksWithIdes: Works with Cursor, VS Code, Claude Code, Windsurf

problem.title: Every session should not start from zero.
problem.mondayTask: On Monday, your AI wires up authentication with Supabase.
problem.tuesdayTask: On Tuesday, you ask it to build password reset.
problem.tuesdayResult: Instead of reusing what it built, it asks: "What auth system are you using?"
problem.explanation: You explain everything again. You paste files again. You re-describe your architecture again.
problem.explanationHighlight: AI is powerful — but without cognitive infrastructure, it forgets everything between sessions. ekkOS fixes this with a three-plane architecture (Data/Processing/Access) and Golden Loop learning that creates a stable, growing cognitive substrate shared across all your tools.

solution.title: Your patterns become your unfair advantage.
solution.patternsCompoundDesc: Every time you solve a problem, ekkOS_™ captures the pattern through Golden Loop learning. Next time a similar issue appears, your AI retrieves your own battle-tested solution from the cognitive infrastructure.
solution.contextPersistsDesc: Your tech stack. Your conventions. Your preferences. ekkOS_™ maintains them in a persistent cognitive substrate across sessions so your AI answers like a long-time collaborator, not a stranger.
solution.intelligenceGrowsDesc: Each interaction evolves your cognitive infrastructure through the Golden Loop: capture → learn → retrieve → apply → measure. The more you ship, the sharper your AI becomes.

individuals.title: Your best fixes should never be one-offs.
individuals.subtitle: ekkOS_™ automatically captures:

features.solutions: Weird edge cases you solved once but don't want to rediscover

individuals.tagline: So when you hit the same class of problem months later, your AI can say: "You solved this before. Here's how you fixed it — and why."
individuals.testimonial: "I solved this auth race condition 3 months ago. My AI found the exact pattern with 'ekko auth race'. Saved me 2 hours."

teams.title: Turn team knowledge into shared memory.
teams.sharedPatternsDesc: Everyone learns from the team's best decisions.
teams.consistentSuggestionsDesc: AI guidance aligns with your engineering standards.
teams.onboardingAccelerationDesc: New engineers gain instant access to the team's accumulated knowledge.
teams.architectureEnforcementDesc: When someone drifts from approved patterns, the AI nudges them back.

tools.title: Five tools. One cognitive infrastructure.
tools.ekkoDesc: Search your cognitive infrastructure for past decisions and patterns.
tools.crystallizeDesc: Permanently preserve an insight or architectural decision.
tools.reflexDesc: Real-time guidance inside your IDE based on your cognitive infrastructure.
tools.traceDesc: Follow a problem back through past incidents and fixes.
tools.consolidateDesc: Combine scattered learnings into stable, reusable patterns.

pricing.title: Simple pricing. Start free.
pricing.subtitle: No credit card required. Upgrade when you're ready.

features.mcp: MCP support (Cursor, VS Code, Claude Code, Windsurf)

cta.title: Persistent AI memory in under two minutes.
cta.subtitle: Add ekkOS_™ to your existing workflow using our MCP client. Works instantly with Cursor, VS Code, Claude Code, Windsurf, and more. The Developer plan is free forever. No credit card required.
